traits.name: Amphibious
entries: Hekaton can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Hekaton makes two broken chain attacks.

actions.name: Broken Chain
entries: Melee atk +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (3d6 + 9 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Ballista
entries: Ranged atk +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 18 (3d10 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Strike {@recharge 5}
entries: Hekaton hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point he can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8 damage) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Thunderous Stomp {@recharge}
entries: Hekaton stomps the ground, triggering a thunderclap. All other creatures within 15 feet of him must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or take 33 (6d10 damage) thunder damage and be {@condition deafened} until the start of Hekaton's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition deafened}. The thunderclap can be heard out to a range of 1,200 feet.
